commandDescriptions.list: List out all the modules and their details
commandDescriptions.update: Update details of a specific module
commandDescriptions.reorder: Adjust the position of modules being displayed in the sidebar

optionDescriptions.language: Language to be used, default to en
optionDescriptions.username: Username, required for authentication, will prompt if not provided
optionDescriptions.password: Username, required for authentication, will prompt if not provided

delete.beforeProceed: Before you proceed, please review the following warnings:

actionScope.title: Action Scope
actionScope.desc: This operation will delete the frontend code for the selected module. However, it will not remove any backend or database components associated with this module.

recoverability.title: Recoverability
recoverability.desc: While this action removes the module from your current working codebase, it is not absolutely irreversible. The deleted code can still be recovered through your Git history if needed.

systemImpact.title: System Impact
systemImpact.desc: Deleting this module may disrupt other parts of the system that depend on it. Please ensure that all dependencies have been reviewed.

backupRecommendation.title: Backup Recommended
backupRecommendation.desc: To avoid any disruptions, we recommend committing your current changes and creating a backup branch before proceeding.

userResponsibility.title: User Responsibility
userResponsibility.desc: By confirming this action, you acknowledge and accept responsibility for any consequences of deleting this module.

dependencies.desc: Any dependencies or integrations relying on this module's frontend may stop functioning properly. This includes routes, UI components, or related features.
dependencies.title: Dependencies

prompts.proceedConfirmation: Do you want to proceed with the deletion process?
prompts.proceedConfirmation2: Please type "{}" to proceed with the deletion process.
prompts.proceedConfirmation3: Are you sure you want to delete the module "{}"?
prompts.finalConfirmation: FINAL CONFIRMATION: Are you really sure you want to delete the module?
prompts.proceedConfirmation4: Please type the module name "{}" to confirm deletion.

OTP.sent: A one-time password has been sent to your email

invalid.OTP: Invalid one-time password format. The code must be a 6-digit number
